name: An Eazy Game...
description:
Hello, this game is my first game, and I hope not last. This is an eazy platformer and I am not a lier. This game is made following a tutorial, and worked over it. I hope you enjoy the experiance! Btw some bugs are intentional.

-Some bugs might happen

-sound is off for now, music is in work

-to exit you need to click windows key on keyboard
